alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cobb, northeastern Douglas and south central Fulton Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sandtown, or near City of South Fulton, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Douglasville, City of South Fulton, Smyrna, East Point, Powder Springs, Austell, Lithia Springs, Fair Oaks, Sweetwater Creek State Park, Jim R Miller Park, Six Flags Over Georgia, Cascade Heights, Sandtown and Mableton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
